title: NLP-Based News Article Classification
description: Developed an NLP-based system for classifying news articles to detect in-article attribution. This project utilized text processing techniques like tokenization and lemmatization to prepare data, followed by a classification model for source identification. Built with Python and Flask, it provides a user-friendly interface for real-time results, enhancing NLP and web development skills.

title: Book Store Application using MERN
description: A full-stack Book Store Application built with the MERN stack, featuring Firebase authentication for secure user login and registration, enabling efficient book management and an intuitive user experience.

title: Restaurant Clone Website
description: Created a responsive Restaurant Website Clone for IBM SkillBuild, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. The project features a clean, user-friendly design with smooth navigation across all devices, replicating a professional restaurant site.
